description: Police say woman was initially thought to have fallen but van driver has now been arrested.
title: Woman dies in suspected hit and run in Filey
title_page: Woman dies in suspected hit and run in Filey - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested following the death of a woman in a suspected hit and run in Filey.
The woman, aged 85, was found seriously injured in Station Road at around 09:00 GMT on Friday and died in hospital on Saturday.
North Yorkshire Police said it was initially believed the woman had fallen but further inquiries established she had been hit by a white van and the driver failed to stop at the scene.
A spokesperson for the force said a man had since been arrested and remained in police custody for questioning.
